<NEW>

WHEELIE did not react over to the parroting of his own mannerisms,=
 merely explaining, "Where I come from, this is what saved my bum.  It was =
a way, to keep my processor off what hapepend each day.  And into each nigh=
t, it would serve to give the others a fright.  It is what kept me strong, =
where I was when I didn't belong."

As the trio walked towards where UNUS w=
as, WHEELIE tensed up again, but surreptisiously in the sense of any old ve=
teran warrior scanning the area for a quick escape route if it was needed. =
 "So, tell me about this UNUS.  What has he or she done to give you such pr=
esence?"

WHEELIE glancing up at ASTRA and FIREHORN, "So tell me, how you c=
ame to be?  This world is strange, it is not quite home on the range."  Wal=
king along to the door as he went silent upon noticing thier regalness, wai=
ting for them to say he could enter.
